frist rant

ok so have you noticed that if you make a blog with a funny name someone feels compled to make a stupid comment that they think is funny if you think there is a joke keepit to your self or say i like this part of your blog it sounds funny if you think aout it

facebox was the site name not show your body

THATS RIGHT ITS THIS RANT AGAIN AND CAPS WILL BE USED THE WHOLE TIME AS I AM PISSED OFF WITH THIS (REALLY I AM)

THE OLD NAME WAS FACEBOX MEANING A BOX FOR YOUR FACE OR YOUR PROFILE PIC NOT SHOW YOUR RIPED ABS OR (AND THIS IS FOR THE LADYS THAT DO THIS TO) SHOW OFF YOUR CLEAVAGE SO BOYS COME TO YOUR PAGE

IF YOUR FACE SOME HOW LOOKS LIKE RIBED ABS OR LARGE BOOBS THEN PLEASE USE THAT PIC IF NOT CHANGE THE FUCKING PIC ASSHOLES

SO INCLOSING IT DOESNT MATTER HOW UGLY OR SPOTTY YOU ARE USE YOUR FACE AS YOUR PROFILE PIC NOT YOUR BODY

the rants go on and on

ok people i have a question

have you ever gone to a site and get pop ups after page you go on and then get 2 more pop ups after you close one i have and i hate that so do you think pop ups should be auto banned from all sites or not coz i bet some people right now have got a pop up from looking at this site also thanks for all the comments on my second blog about what pics piss me off i may make a second blog about it

click here to win a prize

so i did blog about pop ups well now its the turn of yes thats right the scamer ads

thats the ad on most webpages where you click on something enought times and you get a pop up web site saying you won a prize now enter your details in here and your prize will be with in 2 days.

BIGGEST PILE OF BULLCRAP EVER!!!!1

if your stupid enought to fill it in you will be scamed somehow or hacked or sent viruses or worns thankfully i never click then so i dont know what you get but it has to be bad right comment on this if it is

so in closing BAN ALL CLICK TO WIN ADDS AND POP-UPS FROM THE WEB(well all unwanted pop-ups anyway but thats for a different blog)

more rants about the internet

ok so i have covered pop ups and click here to wins well here is something that bugs me more than then page freeze

thats right page freeze why even now someone somewhere is on there fav website and about to find out there page is frozen for no reason i get this about 2 or so times a week if its bein a bad week or something anyway so i go into one of my fav sites and am about to go over to the next page of said site when the buttion does not work so move the mouse to the x and nothing then bang the banner at the top of the page were the x hangs out says something along the lines of "unresoneth page" (i know thats spelt wrong and i cant be bothered to change it ok) so then you click the x the ok the message saying something like "inatice page want to close" you choose yes or ok and then just as you do this the page works and then goes

its like the computer knows how to piss you off and does it to piss you off on pupose

site name war!!!!!!!!!!!!

ok simple little poll blog here all you do is say yes or no and your reason for your answer and any answer is ok with me as long as you answer

so the poll is which name is better face box or PAN

quick question

why do chatroomy things change servers without warning i go on a chatroomy thing from a link on a site and using mirc and yet the same room with the same rules is on both and mirc room is on the old server and the room from the link is on the new server with same rules and same name which brings me back to the question why chnage the server i mean if it just stays the same anyway why both changing the server

comment if your answers i am not gifted with mindreading powers you know

cha cha changes

ok quick to the ponit and easy to say

why the fuck was this sites page layouts changed without saying anything or letting people know if it would change i mean how fucking hard is it to say dear user we are going to change page layouts for..... reason hope this wont bother you to much signed blah i mean if i got a email like that from myscape or bebo i would read it or they would message you but not this site

halloween whats that

this is just a little rant about how halloween is treated by shops and stuff

well its just this the time of year when a family get to gether and stuff then selfs with loads of food and give each other gifts that are forgoten about 3 months later is advertised more than the only time of the year were scaring the living shit out of everyone and yeting the reaction "happy halloween to you to ya little shit" is only advertised one week if that when christmas is advertised all bloody year and even after the christmas just gone and then only thing that gets advertised is the next scary movie that will make jump scream and shit ya self almost

if halloween is going to be left untill last minite why not just plan scrap it and have 2 xmas days

and if you think halloween should be advertised more place a halloween decoration outside or something and keep it there all year and if people say take it down just say why does it bother you to be reminded of one holiday and if they say yes just say then why do you think its ok to see xmas stuff out in july

in closing bring back the halloween sprit we all remember from years gone by or just forget about it

ho ho ho merry christmas and happy sales

yes its the run up to christmas the time shops stores all places that sell stuff get low and stock and drop prices to sell other things but have we ever throught why we give in to the jolly old fat guy and his sack of gifts

ok so this is ment to be the time that jesus was born but its not everyone knows jesus was born in september but we still get some people putting there jesus brith scene out with there frosty the snowman and santa with his rendeer and slay but still why is it we have this one day 6 days before new years that we give gifts and sing songs doesnt anyone thing that companys started this holiday to sell more stuff to people and where did santa come from well santa that we know has bein around since coca cola frist made him up to sell more drinks so why do we still say merry christmas and let kids sit on the fat guys knee well more next blog

same rant just more people pissing me off

all i am saying is look at my picture and you see my face about 60% to 40% of us use are face on here for are picture and thats ok i mean i now i am not getting sexyest male of the year or anything so can get how some people wont use there face so i respect then for that HOWEVER there are people who come up with the idea of showing there musals off for the guys and how big there breats are or creage for the girls WHATS WRONG WITH YOUR FACE YOU FUCKING ASSHOLES i mean if i want to see musals i go to the beach in summer or watch a action film as for girls and there boobs well 90% of the internet is porn so you do the math there i mean boobs and crevage are good and all but we see then everyday you dont have to draw the wrong sort of people to your page ok if you have musals good for you BUT WEAR A DAM SHIRT if you cant get a girlfriend or boyfriend its not your body thats the troble there its personalty GET ONE AND GET A SHIRT

ok thats this rant done if you agree like must people do comment if you dont give me in detail why so i can see your ponit if or dont bother commenting at all i mean its not like i made you read this crap its just my throughs

attemion all faceless shirtless and by some pics brales pepz

this continus from my last blog but hey fuck it anyways just a simple question for the people who do this

people who show there bodys cleavage or other area of the body not to do with your face that people first see and make first throughts of you about from ( and yes people do judge you from your face) here is the question everyone shouts at at your picture WHY THE FUCK DO YOU USE THAT AS YOUR PIC INSEAD OF YOUR FACE answer in the comments box below i maybe anythings but psykick is not one of then or have superman like hearing

what does christmas mean to you

as the name says what does christmas mean to you this is a poll blog meaning you tell me and who ever else reads this what you think and no dissing people for wha they think

so to get this snow flake to a snow ball i shall start

christmas to me is a time to put aside your differentes and get alnoe with your fellow man or woman and just enjoy yourself

after all in world war 1 or 2 they stoped fighting and started playing football and making snowmen not killing then each other

14th of february aka valenitine's day

its that day again so the poll here is what would you like to happen to you on this day of loving again all you need to put is what you want to happen to you only

attack of mutated bunnys

yes its the easter season and what better way to remember the rise of jesus than with chocolate eggs and chocolate bunnys i mean really if this doesnt reck of company created holidays i dont know what does i mean were in the bible does it say "and as jesus rose again chocolate bunnys and eggs came from ya cave and oh how the people rejoysed" coz i never saw it

anyway you know what to do leave comments and your views so i dont have to try to become psykick and read ya mind

spam the fucking spamers

if your like me and sick to death of companys spaming you with random crap like your get this if you reply i mean come on how did they get my email address have they not heard of the data protection act

ranting is fun you should try it

ok well for my return rant i will vent my views on people who go over board about much they weigh

i mean the only reason most people go over board is thanks to models who look more like a coat rack or bones in a sack of skin i mean the day i find that hot is the day i go to the nut house and i pray that never happens and why do people think they need to look like that anyways i mean if your overweigh your unhealthy and if your weigh your even more unhealthy so why cant people be happy how they are i mean i am so why cant others be

and now i shout out the shouts

the thing on the main page here where you can say look at my page well this has made me want to rant for a good reason and here it comes

begging for comments trying to hook up and posting your email address

why the hell do people do that what happened to "come and check my page out" or "visit my page plz" coz i want to know

and why cant people wear a top in there pics i mean really if your so desberate to get someone why not LEAVE YOUR GO DAM HOUSE trust me your meet more people

holy shit your back

i am back and have nothing much to rant about people still use there body to show people there face others/same people try to draw people to there page with shouts saying things like "hey ladys come to my page for a good time" or "visit my page" why do people think we can read what they put when that thing changes to the next shout every ten seconds anyways its a new year filled with new things for me rant about about you to read and hope i read your mind to see what you think of then

LEAVE A GOD DAMN COMMENT WILL YOU

YES YOU READING THIS AND YOU WITH THE EYES STOP POSING FOR YOUR NEXT BODY PIC AND USE YOUR FACE

debate time yay

ok so this will make comments for sure

do you believe in a god and if so what gender do you think they are me i dont follow any religion they seen ponitless to me anyways you say your view and dont try to pull me into your religion because i believe in freedon of choice not making someone follow what you do because that other person will go to hell bla bla bla

THATS THE END NOW COMMENT MY MIND READING POWERS ARE STILL IN THE MAIL
